dashboard.overview: Chidule cha ntchito zanu za village banking
dashboard.no_activity_desc: Yambani mwakulowa mu gulu kapena kupereka chopereka.
dashboard.make_contribution_desc: Perekani chopereka chanu cha mwezi uno ku gulu lanu
dashboard.apply_loan_desc: Pemphani ngongole ku gulu lililonse lomwe muli membala
dashboard.manage_groups_desc: Onani ndi kusamalira magulu anu a village banking
dashboard.insights_desc: Tikukonza njira zathu zoganizira pogwiritsa ntchito AI kuti tikuthandizeni kukulitsa gulu lanu. Onaninso posachedwa kuti mupeze malangizo oyenera.
dashboard.ensure_details: Onetsetsani kuti zambiri za akaunti yanu ndizolondola.
dashboard.start_participating: Yambani kutenga nawo mbali m'gulu la village banking.
dashboard.optimal_state: Zochitika zanu zili pamalo abwino kwambiri.
dashboard.join_group_error_desc: Muyenera kukhala membala wa gulu kuti mupereke ndalama.

groups.manage_desc: Samalirani magulu anu a village banking
groups.track_growth: Yanganirani zopereka, ngongole, ndi kukula kwa chuma chanu.
groups.create_group_desc: Yambani gulu latsopano lofuna kupititsa patsogolo chuma chanu ndi anthu a mâ€™dera lanu.
groups.no_groups_desc: Simunalowe mu gulu lirilonse la village banking pakali pano.
groups.admin_only_desc: Oyang'anira okha ndi omwe amaloledwa kusintha dongosolo la gululi.
groups.delete_warning_desc: Izi sizingathe kusinthidwa. Izi zichotsa gulu ndi deta yake yonse.
groups.delete_confirm_desc: Izi sizingathe kusinthidwa. Izi zichotsa gulu ndi deta yake yonse.

vault.title: Thumba
vault.no_records_desc: Palibe zopereka kapena ngongole zomwe zapezeka.

contributions.title: Zopereka
contributions.subtitle: Samalirani zopereka zanu za mwezi ndi mwezi
contributions.reminder_desc: Simunapereke chopereka chanu cha mwezi wa {month}.
contributions.no_contributions_desc: Yambani kupereka ku magulu anu a village banking.

loans.title: Ngongole
loans.subtitle: Samalirani mapemphero anu a ngongole ndi kubwezera
loans.eligibility_desc: Onani ngati muli oyenera kutenga ngongole m'magulu anu
loans.no_loans_desc: Pemphani ngongole yanu yoyamba mukamaliza miyezi itatu yopereka zopereka.

profile.title: Mbiri Yanu
profile.subtitle: Onani zambiri zanu ndi momwe mukugwirira ntchito

landing.subtitle: Kupititsa patsogolo anthu a m'Malawi kudzera m'dongosolo la village banking lotetezeka komanso lapafoni.
landing.circle_mgt_desc: Pangani ndi kusamalira magulu anu osungitsira ndalama mosavuta ndi malamulo omveka.
landing.liquidity_desc: Pezani ngongole mwachangu kudzera m'ndondomeko yosavuta.
landing.staking_desc: Yanganirani momwe chuma cha gulu lanu chikukulira nthawi yonse.
landing.trust_desc: Timaphatikiza chikhalidwe chakwathu ndi chitetezo chamakono kuteteza tsogolo lanu.
landing.security_desc: Ndalama ndi zambiri zanu ndizosungika bwino kwambiri.
landing.realtime_desc: Onani zosintha zonse m'gulu lanu nthawi yomweyo pafoni yanu.
landing.elite_interface_desc: Yopangidwa kuti igwire bwino m'Malawi mwa liwiro pafoni iliyonse.
landing.cta_desc: Lowani nawo zikwizikwi za a Malawi omwe akusamalira chuma chawo mosavuta.

register.register_desc: Dzilembetseni kuti muyambe kusunga ndi kukongola m'gulu lanu.

forgot.title: Bwezeretsani Kufikira
forgot.subtitle: Lembani imelo yanu kuti mulandire ulalo wotetezeka bwezeretsera.
forgot.success_desc: Ngati akaunti ilipo ya {email}, mulandira ulalo wotumizidwa posachedwa.
forgot.error_user_not_found: Palibe akaunti yomwe yapezeka ndi imeloyi.

reset.title: Tetezani Mawu Achinsinsi Atsopano
reset.subtitle: Pangani mawu achinsinsi amphamvu a mbiri yanu ya village bank.
reset.success_desc: Mawu anu achinsinsi asinthidwa bwino. Mutha kulowa tsopano.
reset.error_invalid_token: Ulalo wabwezeretserawu ndi wolakwika kapena watha nthawi yake.

help.title: Momwe Village Bank Imagwirira Ntchito
help.subtitle: Zowongolera mwatsatanetsatane za udindo uliwonse mu banki yanu ya m'mudzi.
help.need_help_desc: Gulu lathu lothandizira lili okonzeka kukuthandizani pa nkhani iliyonse yomwe sinatchulidwe m'mabukuwa.

member_section.dashboard_desc: Malo apakati pazochitika zanu zonse zakubanki. Kuyang'anira ndalama zanu ndi ngongole kwakhala kosavuta.

dashboard_steps.overview_desc: Onani Ndalama Zonse Zosungidwa, Ngongole Zotsala, ndi Zochitika Zaposachedwa mwachangu.
dashboard_steps.navigation_desc: Gwiritsani ntchito menyu yakumbali (kapena pansi pa foni) kusintha pakati pa Magulu, Zopereka, ndi Ngongole.
dashboard_steps.notifications_desc: Onani chizindikiro cha belu kuti mudziwe zofunika monga kuvomerezedwa kwa ngongole kapena zikumbutso za zopereka.

member_section.joining_desc: Village banking ndi nkhani ya anthu amodzi. Umu ndi momwe mungalumikizane ndi ena.

joining_steps.join_desc: Pezani ulalo wopemphera kulowa kuchokera kwa membala kapena mtsogoleri. Dinani kuti mupemphe kulowa.
joining_steps.create_desc: Pitani patsamba la Magulu, dinani 'Pangani Gulu Latsopano', ndikukhazikitsa malamulo (ndalama zopereka, chiwongoladzanja).
joining_steps.details_desc: Dinani pa khadi la gulu lililonse kuti muwone mamembala ake, ndalama zonse, ndi mbiri yanu m'gululo.

member_section.contributions_desc: Kusunga pafupipafupi kumateteza tsogolo lanu lazachuma. Timathandizira njira zingapozosunga.

contributions_steps.select_desc: Pitani patsamba la Zopereka ndikusankha gulu lomwe mukufuna kuperekako.
contributions_steps.method_desc: Mutha kulipira kudzera pa Mobile Money (Airtel/TNM) kapena kulipira Cash kwa Msungichuma wanu.
contributions_steps.verify_desc: Mukalipira pa intaneti, mudzalandira chitsimikizo nthawi yomweyo. Mukalipira cash, Msungichuma wanu ayenera kulemba pamanja.

member_section.loans_desc: Pezani ndalama pomwe mukuzifuna kwambiri, kutengera mbiri yanu yosunga.

loans_steps.check_desc: Gwiritsani ntchito chowunikira kuyenera patsamba la Ngongole kuti muwone malire anuobwereka.
loans_steps.apply_desc: Dinani 'Pemphani Ngongole', Ikani ndalama, ndikusankha nthawi yobwerera.
loans_steps.wait_desc: Atsogoleri/Asungichuma adzaunika pempho lanu. Mukaloledwa, ndalama zidzatulutsidwa.

treasurer_section.responsibilities_desc: Monga msungichuma, ndinu woyang'anira chuma cha gulu. Kulondola kwanu kumatsegula njira ya chikhulupiriro m'gulu. Muli ndi mwayi wapadera wolemba ndalama zoperekedwa m'manja.
treasurer_section.recording_desc: Pamene membalaakupatsani ndalama za cash, muyenera kuzilemba nthawi yomweyo kuti musinthe akaunti yawo.

recording_steps.open_desc: Pitani patsamba la Gulu ndikuyang'ana batani la 'Lembani Cash' (lowoneka kwa Asungichuma okha).
recording_steps.enter_details_desc: Ikani Ndalama, Mwezi/Chaka chomwe malipirowa akukhudza, ndi kufotokoza mwachidule.
recording_steps.confirm_desc: Tumizani fomu. Membala adzawona izi zikuwonekera patsamba lawo nthawi yomweyo.

treasurer_section.verifying_desc: Onetsetsani kuti ndalama za cash zomwe zili m'bokosi zikufanana ndi mbiri ya mu makina.

verifying_steps.check_desc: Yerekezerani chiwerengero cha 'Total Cash' mu app ndi ndalama zenizeni zomwe muli nazo.
verifying_steps.log_desc: Onani tabu ya 'Mbiri' kuti muwone zochitika zonse zolembetsedwa ndikuwona zolakwika.
verifying_steps.discrepancies_desc: Ngati ziwerengero sizikugwirizana, onani ngati pali zopereka zaposachedwa zomwe sizinaperekedwe kapena zalembedwa kawiri.

admin_section.responsibilities_desc: Monga Mtsogoleri wa Gulu, ndinu mtsogoleri wa gulu lanu losunga ndalama. Mumakhazikitsa malamulo, kuvomereza mamembala, ndikuyang'anira ndondomeko yobwereka kuti gulu lipambane.
admin_section.member_mgt_desc: Mangani gulu lochita zinthu limodzi mosamalitsa omwe akulowa m'gulumu.

member_mgt_steps.review_desc: Pamene wina agwiritsa ntchito ulalo wanu woitanira, muyenera kuwavomereza asanalowe.
member_mgt_steps.manage_desc: Onani zambiri za mamembala ndikuchotsa aliyense amene akuphwanya malamulo a gulu.
member_mgt_steps.roles_desc: Kwezani mamembala odalirika kukhala Msungichuma kapena Mlembi kuti akuthandizeni ntchito.

admin_section.loan_oversight_desc: Tetezani chuma cha gulu powunika mapemphero a ngongole.

loan_oversight_steps.review_desc: Onani zopempha za ngongole pa kuchuluka, cholinga, ndi kuthekera kwa membala kubweza.
loan_oversight_steps.approve_desc: Pangani chisankho chomaliza. Ngongole zovomerezedwa zimalowa pamzere kuti zitulutsidwe.
loan_oversight_steps.monitor_desc: Tsata ngongole zomwe zilipo ndikutsata zolipirira zilizonse zomwe zaphonya.

settings_page.title: Zokonda pa Mbiri
settings_page.subtitle: Samalirani zambiri za mbiri yanu.
settings_page.updates_sync_desc: Zosintha pano zidzawoneka ndikusintha m'magulu anu onse nthawi yomweyo.
settings_page.security_desc: Samalirani njira zanu zolowera ndi makiyi achitetezo.

verification_form.title: Kutsimikizira Mbiri
verification_form.subtitle: Kwezani zikalata zanu zovomerezeka kuti mutsimikizire mbiri yanu.
verification_form.submitted_desc: Gulu lathu liwunika zikalata zanu posachedwa. Mudzalandira uthenga mukatsimikiziridwa.
verification_form.selfie_sub: Gwirani ID yanu pafupi ndi nkhope yanu
verification_form.secure_note: Zikalata zanu ndizotetezedwa ndipo zimasungidwa mwachinsinsi. Zikuwoneka kwa oyang'anira ovomerezeka okha.

footer.desc: Kupatsa mphamvu anthu a m'madera ndi zida zachuma zowonekera bwino, zosavuta, komanso zamakono. Yomangidwira tsogolo la Malawi.
